metadata.synopsis: Converted to a DaisyAD but the dialog filename hasn't yet changed.This is the line Daisy says after the player's PAD on entering the astral prison.PAD that comes before this is INT_EmperorRevealed_PAD_FirstTimeInAstralPrison
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go into the Astral Portal in INT.

0.text: I'm here - help me! I'm under attack!
0.context: NodeContext: speaking telepathically with urgency while under attack
